components.name: Studio

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Content Assist not working under Ti.UI namespace. Video example shows the issue. Project workspace has been reset to defaults. Projects cleaned and rebuilt.

Steps:
1. Create a new project set for 3.2.0RC
2. Start typing for Ti.UI namespace

comments.body: This is a duplicate of TISTUD-5921. The current workaround is to go to Preferences > Studio > Content Assist and manually select Android, Blackberry, iPad, Iphone, MobileWeb & Tizen for Alloy Project Nature.

Unfortunately those steps do not work. It is true that when i looked at the Alloy content assist selections that none of them where checked, but this is not an Alloy project. This is a Classic Project. All of the assist options are selected for Mobile (and now Alloy), and it still is not recognizing the Items within the namespace. I also ensured that project specific Content Assist Setting were turned off.
